Text: hello,im new to all this and want to put my cds on tpb but dont know how to upload,i have been to upload page but dont know what to click on,any help would be most appreciated.

hello, can you create a torrent?, place yourfiles in a folder, name it like the cd, when go into utorrent, click on the: file menu, then create new torrent. and in the tracker field put these trackers:

http://tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce

http://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce

http://denis.stalker.h3q.com:6969/announce

After that click on the: ad directory / add file. then look up the file/directory you will share, ( the directory that contains the files)

when click ok.

When  create and save as.

Save the torrent file on the harddisk.

The torrentfile such have names like: 

F:\Seed\Dolly_Parton_-_The_Very_Best_Of_Dolly_Parton_-_2007_CD_mp3_320kbits_CD-Uploader.torrent

Se the .Torrent file extension.

when go to the upload page on TPB.

Klick browse (right side on the torrent field)

When look up where you have saved the ..Torrentfile.

klick open it.

When fill i the  a description in the field.

fill i the capcha.

when click upload
when klcik upload
when you have uploaded a torrent, please leva the torrent link in a commen on this torrent.
will do... and thanks again for your help
welcome to the biggest sharing place
